languages.text: "Теперь я с остатками свиты останусь здесь, дожидаться помощи. А ты ступай — еще столько звезд не открыто, миров не изучено..." {n}Взгляд Каллигоса вновь обращается к небу — и первым звездам, робко ступившим на небосклон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Теперь я с остатками свиты останусь здесь, дожидаться помощи. А ты ступай — еще столько звезд не открыто, миров не изучено..." {n}Взгляд Каллигоса вновь обращается к небу — и первым звездам, робко ступившим на небосклон.{/n}

languages.text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Теперь я с остатками свиты останусь здесь, дожидаться помощи. А ты ступай — еще столько звезд не открыто, миров не изучено..." {n}Взгляд Каллигоса вновь обращается к небу — и первым звездам, робко ступившим на небосклон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I will remain here with the rest of the entourage and wait for help. And you should go — there are so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze turns to the sky once again — and the young shy stars there.{/n}

"I will remain here with the rest of the entourage and wait for help. And you should go — there are so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze turns to the sky once again — and the young shy stars there.{/n}

"I will remain here with the rest of the entourage and wait for help. And you should go — there are so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze turns to the sky once again, and to the first stars that timidly step into it.{/n}

"I will remain here with the rest of the entourage and wait for help. And you should go — there are so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze turns to the sky once again, and to the first stars that timidly step into it.{/n}

"I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

"I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

languages.text: «Permaneceré aquí con lo que queda de mi escolta y esperaré a que llegue la ayuda. Usted váyase; ahí fuera todavía quedan muchos mundos desconocidos y estrellas por descubrir...». {n}Calligos vuelve a mirar hacia lo alto y contempla las primeras estrellas que afloran tímidamente en el cielo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Permaneceré aquí con el resto del séquito y esperaré a que llegue la ayuda. Usted váyase; ahí fuera quedan muchos mundos desconocidos y estrellas por descubrir...». {n}Calligos desvía la mirada hacia el firmamento una vez más y contempla las primeras estrellas que afloran tímidamente en él.{/n}

languages.text: “我准备和剩下的人留在这里，等待救援。你该走了，远方还有那么多未被探索的星星，未知的世界……”{n}卡里戈斯的目光转向天空，目视着群星在夜空中逐渐变亮。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我准备和剩下的随从留在这里，等待救援。你该走了，远方还有那么多未被探索的星星，未知的世界……”{n}卡里戈斯的目光转向天空，目视着最初的群星怯生生地在夜空中露面。{/n}

languages.text: « Je vais rester ici avec ce qui reste de mon escorte et attendre les secours. Vous devriez partir, il reste tant d'étoiles et de mondes inconnus à découvrir... » {n}Le regard de Calligos se tourne à nouveau vers le ciel, où les premières étoiles commencent à apparaître.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vais rester ici avec ce qui reste de mon entourage et attendre les secours. Vous devriez partir, il y a tant d'étoiles et de mondes inconnus à découvrir... » {n}Le regard de Calligos se tourne à nouveau vers le ciel, où les premières étoiles commencent timidement à apparaître.{/n}

languages.text: 「俺は残った側近と共にここに残り、助けを待つ。お前は行け。未知の星や未知の世界がたくさんあるのだからな…」{n}カリゴスの視線は再び空に向けると、最初の星々が現れ始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺は他の側近とともにここに残り、助けを待つ。お前は行け。未知の星や未知の世界がたくさんあるのだからな…」{n}カリゴスの視線は再び空に、そしてこわごわと足を踏み入れる最初の星へと向けられた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bleibe mit den Überresten meiner Eskorte hier und warte auf Hilfe. Und Ihr solltet gehen. Es gibt noch so viele Sterne und Welten zu entdecken ..." {n}Calligos' Blick richtet sich wieder gen Himmel, wo langsam die ersten Sterne erscheinen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bleibe mit dem Rest des Gefolges hier und warte auf Hilfe. Und Ihr solltet gehen. Es gibt noch so viele Sterne und Welten zu entdecken ..." {n}Calligos' Blick richtet sich wieder gen Himmel, zu den ersten Sternen, die ihn schüchtern betreten.{/n}

languages.text: "Refakatçilerimden kalanlarla burada yardım bekleyeceğim. Senin ise gitmen gerek. Hâlâ keşfedilmeyi bekleyen pek çok yıldız ve bilinmeyen pek çok dünya var..." {n}Calligos'un bakışları, ilk yıldızların ortaya çıkmaya başladığı göğe bir kez daha dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will remain here with what's left of my escort and wait for help. And you should go — there are still so many undiscovered stars and unknown worlds out there..." {n}Calligos's gaze once again turns to the sky, where the first stars begin to appear.{/n}
